# PostCSS [![Gitter][chat-img]][chat]

<img align="right" width="95" height="95"
     alt="Philosopherâ€™s stone, logo of PostCSS"
     src="http://postcss.github.io/postcss/logo.svg">

[chat-img]: https://img.shields.io/badge/Gitter-Join_the_PostCSS_chat-brightgreen.svg
[chat]:     https://gitter.im/postcss/postcss

PostCSS is a tool for transforming styles with JS plugins.
These plugins can lint your CSS, supportÂ variablesÂ andÂ mixins,
transpileÂ futureÂ CSSÂ syntax, inlineÂ images, andÂ more.

PostCSS is used by industry leaders including Wikipedia, Twitter, Alibaba,
and JetBrains. TheÂ [Autoprefixer]Â PostCSS pluginÂ isÂ oneÂ ofÂ theÂ most popular
CSS processors.

PostCSS takes a CSS file and provides an API to analyze and modify its rules
(byÂ transformingÂ themÂ intoÂ anÂ [AbstractÂ SyntaxÂ Tree]).
This API can then be used by [plugins] toÂ do aÂ lot ofÂ usefulÂ things,
e.g.Â toÂ find errors automatically insert vendor prefixes.
